``` {python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker
from shiny.express import render, ui


def sin(a, b):
  fig, ax = plt.subplots()
  x = np.linspace(0, 10, 10000) #retorna 100 valores entre 0 e 10
  y = np.sin(int(a)*x+int (b))
  plt.plot(x, y, linewidth = 1)
  ax.set(xlim=(0, 8), xticks=np.arange(1, 8),
         ylim=(-1.5, 1.5), yticks=np.arange(-1, 2))

ui.input_slider("sliderA", "Slider", 0, 25, 1, animate = True)
ui.input_slider("sliderB", "Slider", 0, 25, 1 , animate = True)
```
